resources.string: when you open your app a list of activities will appear, you can choose what suits you
Search for your lovely Song, you can buy it
CardForm can be used as a simple credit card validation form with any credit card form and any payment API

the Android framework displays a Now Playing card on the home screen when there is an active MediaSession. The card includes media metadata such as album art, title, and app icon. When the user selects the card, the system opens the app.s
